label: 具平
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (964-1009). Prince. Also known as Nochi no chūshoō 後中書王 (the Later Prince in the Central Ministery"). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (9), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集 (10), and Sakumon daitai (1). Compositions in Honchō reisō, Honchō monzui (2). [漢詩、作文大体、本朝麗藻、本朝文粋] "
